items.sentence: Last night was very hot and muggy and I didn\'t sleep very well.
I don\'t think that you need to tell Tom why you went Australia.
It\'ll probably take you about 10 minutes to solve this problem.
I\'ve always been a little curious about how Tom became so rich.
I\'ve been trying to get a hold of Tom for the last ten minutes.
Tom and Mary don\'t seem to really talk to each other very much.
Tom told me he wouldn\'t be late, but he still hasn\'t shown up.
At school, Tom ignored me and pretended that he didn\'t know me.
I cried when Tom told me that he and Mary were getting divorced.
Tom wasn\'t able to provide an alibi so the police arrested him.
I was wondering if you\'d like to go to a movie with me tonight.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary would be willing to lend him her guitar.
I guess Tom didn\'t get around to painting the barn last summer.
Tom slowed down for the stop sign, but he didn\'t actually stop.
A bucket list is a list of things you want to do before you die.
Tom boiled some eggs on the rocket stove that he had just built.
I made up my mind to do the work no matter how hard it might be.
I think you should let Tom know that you don\'t want to do that.
Tom\'s dog is still waiting for him just outside the front door.
Tom\'s one big ambition in life was to become a race car driver.
